report.title: Harsh Smoke
report.author: New guy
report.bodytext: Background: /n I am 16 the only drugs Ive tried other then this is cannabis frequently for the last while and alcohol once, t3's orally for awhile (ran out) and I tried taking nutmeg orally. Got about 2 spoon full down then the next one I spit up to no effect. /n /n Earlier this day: /n I haven't eaten since about 6 1/2 hours ago so I have empty stomach, I smoked cannabis bout 7 1/2 hours ago (should be back at baseline). Thats the last of my cannabis. I am really bored and I don't like being sober and read both good and bad reports smoking it so if I don't have to taste it decided Id try it. /n /n Bowl Size: /n width and length = 1 inch /n depth = 1 cm /n /n Timeline: /n /n t+0:00 /n I smoked my first bowl, nutmeg is really flammable. When I lit it it stayed lit the whole time, I had to put it out with bottom of lighter. I took quite a few hits, couldn't keep up with the burning but got quite a bit. Also I agree with the statement of it being heavy smoke, I didn't find it harsh on the throat like cannabis the first time but more harsh directly on the lungs. Burns my nostrils when exhaling through nose. /n /n t+0:01 /n It really stinks just like nutmeg so I wet my pipe. Gonna let it dry but needed stink out. Had a drink of water. /n /n t+0:02 /n No effects noticed except slight light headedness. Gonna smoke another bowl. /n /n t+0:03 /n Smoked second bowl doesn't get any easier on the throat really, didn't burn as easily, because I washed it but it did burn but no less harsh but a bit of chunks of nutmeg washed into my mouth while inhaling (ew!) /n /n t+0:05 /n Mild marijuana like high, spacey mainly. I ate a banana, hungry but not from nutmeg just from not eating for awhile. /n /n t+0:15 /n No more effects, want better so I did another half of bowl. /n /n t+0:40 /n No more effects again the same, did another full bowl, decided thats the last if it doesn't work with 3.5 bowls it's not worth it. /n /n t+1:20 /n Went for a walk to avoid parents, felt a little nauseas but thats gone. /n /n t+1:50 /n I feel like Im back at baseline. /n /n Good Parts: /n mild high /n /n Bad parts: /n harsh smoke /n nauseas (not too bad) /n heavy smell /n bit of bad taste /n short high /n need to smoke too much for effects
